page.title: 12 A Newspaper Reporter
page.content: The Headmistress of the Infants School told us about her husband who is a{Reporter}for a{National Newspaper He travels all over the country looking for stories, but,the the main area that he covers is Merseyside and North Wales. A few years ago when he was in Leeds, he had to go and report on a coach bomb, when 25 people were killed. Very recently, he went to write a story on the{Bradford City Football {Club Disaster}when 52 people were killed. To get the information to the office, he telephones the newsdesk where a secretary types out the story as he reads it out to her. He has been a reporter for 17 years and enjoys his work tremendously.
